eligibility:
The programme aims to provide students with the necessary knowledge and skills to become data-driven decision-makers in their respective industries. The programme intends to keep students ahead of the curve as the demand for skilled data science and AI professionals are rapidly increasing.
ELIGIBILITY FOR ADMISSION:
Candidates who have obtained a minimum of 50% aggregate marks from a recognized University in India or abroad accredited by UGC/AIU are eligible to apply. The eligible programs are as follows:
(i) BE / BTech (All Combinations)
(ii) BCA or any BSc  with Plus 2 Mathematics
(iii) BA / BCom / BBA with  Mathematics / Business Maths / Data Analytics / Data Science / Statistics / Computer Science
why_choose: Why choose this course? Industry-Relevant Skill Development Practical Learning with Real-world Projects Strategic Collaboration with CleverInsight Tailored Schedule for Working Professionals Learn advanced AI techniques using the latest tools Expert Faculty and Industry Collaboration
what_learn: What you will learn? Foundational Statistical Skills: Master statistical methods, scripting languages, and visual analytics to analyze and interpret data effectively. Data Engineering Proficiency: Acquire skills in data engineering and pipelines, crucial for handling and processing large datasets in real-world scenarios. Advanced Statistical Learning: Explore statistical learning models, NLP, and NLG to uncover insights and patterns, enhancing decision-making processes. Applied AI in Business: Learn to apply AI in business contexts, gaining insights into how AI can revolutionize and optimize various aspects of organizational operations. Specialized Electives: Choose from various specialized electives, including deep learning models, real-time data modeling, and others tailored to your interests and career goals. Capstone Projects: Apply acquired knowledge in capstone projects across semesters, reinforcing practical skills and demonstrating competence in statistical analysis and applied AI.
